means: 大量使用标语口号( sloganeer的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The voters are pretty sick of such a surfeit of primary sloganeering.
sentence.Network_cn: 选民们对于初选时没完没了地空喊口号的现象感到发腻了.

sentence.Network_en: What's needed is not the sloganeering of certain politicians but a clear - eyed , multifaceted policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们需要的不是政客的口号,而是一个清晰的 、 面面俱到的政策.

sentence.Network_en: But Yevgeny Volk says Kremlin talk of diversification and mobility amounts to sloganeering.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是,沃尔克说,梅德韦杰夫谈到的多样化和流动性只是空谈.

list.abs: They used these two slogans to oppose us ., 他们利用这两个口号反对我们.
Equality of men and women is not a slogan ., 男女平等不是一句口号.
What do you think of the slogan " New Beijing , Great Olympics " ?, 你觉得 " 新北京 , 新奥运 " 这个口号怎么样?
上海外事 ... 奥运会秩序册 Olympic program 奥运口号，火炬和标志 Olympic slogan,torch and symbols 奥运旅游 Olympic tourism.
英文背诵短章-小升初-牛津英语网 ... Love Your Life 热爱生活 Olympic Slogan 奥运主题口号 Love 爱情.

entry.tran: (在宣传中)标语口号的使用，简短醒目的广告语的使用
entry.def: Sloganeering is the use of slogans by people such as politicians or advertising agencies.

example.tran: 营销部对标语口号的利用

means.word_mean: 1. persuasion by means of empty slogans

auth_sentence.content: The songs are political, but not in any fist-clenching, sloganeering fashion.
auth_sentence.res_content: The songs are political, but not in any fist-clenching, sloganeering fashion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The songs are political, but not in any fist-clenching, sloganeering fashion.

auth_sentence.content: On top, both songwriters have a very strong political polemic that doesn't overwhelm with sloganeering.
auth_sentence.res_content: On top, both songwriters have a very strong political polemic that doesn't overwhelm with sloganeering.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On top, both songwriters have a very strong political polemic that doesn't overwhelm with sloganeering.

auth_sentence.content: Hard rock like this is better suited to dumb sloganeering than to the dense and intricate lyrics that State Radio enjoy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hard rock like this is better suited to dumb sloganeering than to the dense and intricate lyrics that State Radio enjoy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hard rock like this is better suited to dumb sloganeering than to the dense and intricate lyrics that State Radio enjoy.
